name: Curtis Bennett
bio: With over 15 years of experience in the travel industry, Curtis founded Travel Planet with a vision to change how people experience the world.
quote: Travel is the only thing you buy that makes you richer.

name: Lewis Sanders
bio: Lewis has visited over 50 countries and brings his extensive knowledge of global destinations to curate our unique travel experiences.
quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.

name: Daniel Harrison
bio: Daniel ensures that every Travel Planet trip runs smoothly, from logistics to customer experience. His expertise in hospitality management helps create stress-free journeys for travelers.
quote: The best trips are the ones where you forget about time and just live in the moment.

name: Sophia Bloomsbury
bio: Sophia specializes in personalized itineraries for adventure seekers, luxury travelers, and cultural explorers. Having visited over 40 countries, she brings firsthand experience to every trip she designs.
quote: A great itinerary is like a great story—exciting, unpredictable, and full of surprises!

name: Ethan Reed
bio: Ethan is the creative force behind Travel Planet's branding and social media, using storytelling and photography to inspire wanderlust in travelers worldwide.
quote: Every journey has a story—our job is to help you tell yours.

name: Maddie Bray
bio: Maddie ensures every traveler receives top-tier service before, during, and after their trip. Her background in customer relations makes her an expert in creating smooth, worry-free experiences.
quote: It's not just about where you go—it's about how you feel when you get there.
